cause.description:
Prematurity is a silent crisis in America. The March of Dimes Prematurity Campaign is a multi-year, multimillion dollar research, awareness and education campaign to help families have healthier babies.
With world partners, March of Dimes spreads the word about cost-effective interventions that can improve infant health worldwide.
www.marchofdimes.com
1. To promote infant welfare before, during, and after pregnancy.
cause.mission: improve the health of babies by preventing birth defects, premature birth, and infant mortality.
cause.name: MARCH OF DIMES
